dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3491705O] Violation of AUP
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 14, 2007 2:43 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3491705O] Violation of AUP

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Violation of AUP
Added by system at Wednesday, Mar 14 2007 07:42 pm 
X-MailFrom: abuse@flyaow.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Wed Mar 14 19:42:02 2007 
Received: (qmail 5141 invoked by alias); 15 Mar 2007 00:42:02 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: (qmail 5138 invoked from network); 15 Mar 2007 00:42:02 -0000 
Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 15 Mar 2007 00:42:02 -0000

Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Wed, 14 Mar 2007 19:42:02 -0500 
Return-path: <abuse@flyaow.com> 
Delivery-date: Wed, 14 Mar 2007 19:42:02 -0500 
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) 
 by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse@flyaow.com) 
 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim) 
 id 1HRe2c-0004aX-8D 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 14 Mar 2007 19:42:02 -0500 
Received: from qs170.pair.com ([216.92.131.170]) 
        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse@flyaow.com) 
        with smtp (Exim) 
        id 1HRe2O-000Hg3-T1 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 14 Mar 2007 19:41:49 -0500 
Received: (qmail 74612 invoked by uid 3023); 15 Mar 2007 00:41:46 -0000 
Received: from localhost (sendmail-bs@127.0.0.1) 
  by localhost with SMTP; 15 Mar 2007 00:41:46 -0000 
Date: Wed, 14 Mar 2007 20:41:46 -0400 (EDT) 
From: Abuse Role Account <abuse@flyaow.com> 
X-X-Sender: flyaow@qs170.pair.com 
To: abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: Violation of AUP 
Message-ID: <Pine.BSF.4.58.0703142039370.74530@qs170.pair.com> 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: TEXT/PLAIN; charset=US-ASCII 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Mar 2007 00:42:02.0402 (UTC)
FILETIME=[BF4FC020:01C7669A] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
It has come to our attention that a website hosted by your company at 
http://www.vai.st/sterling/ 
 
is violating your AUP.  It is stealing copyrighted material and placing
it 
in hidden text that the search engines will then search in an attempt to

misdirect search traffic to an affiliate program. 
 
Please note the bulk of our content at http://flyaow.com/europe.shtml 
appears as "no script" text on the offending page. 
 
We have attempted to contact the site owner but have not received a 
response.  Would you be so kind as to remove the content and warn your 
customer? 
 
Thank you. 
 
------------------------------ 
Abuse Enforcement Department 
Airlines of the Web, Inc. 
abuse@flyaow.com 
http://flyaow.com 
------------------------------
